Free Webinar: Practical ePayment Applications for Travel Booking
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Are you a CFO, financial controller, director of operations or an accounting manager for an online travel agency, traditional agency, or tour operator booking travel for clients?
Then ask yourself these questions:
-- Are high volumes of supplier booking payments creating an accounting nightmare for your payments teams? -- Are you sacrificing control, or having difficulty managing to contracted rates with your supplier base? -- Do you spend too much time resolving payment disputes?
If so, our panel of payments experts in travel booking will help you tackle this problem in a different way.
In this webinar, payment experts from Wright Express, Expedia and HotelTonight will discuss how single-use virtual accounts can help drive efficiencies in the payment and settlement process for OTAs, traditional agencies and tour operators.
You will hear tips – and potential traps to avoid – when evaluating the landscape of electronic payment solutions for travel booking.
The webinar is scheduled for February 23rd, 11am US EST/4pm UK. You can register here: https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/677676806 .
Our webinar panelists are:
-- Jim Pratt, Wright Express, VP, Corporate Payment Solutions -- Chris Richter, Expedia, Senior Project Manager, Financial Operations -- Jared Simon, HotelTonight, Chief Operating Officer -- Marc DeVallette, Wright Express, Product Manager
I hope you can join what is sure to be an informative session.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone}{!User.Email}
